title: Iran Guardian Coun. and Supreme Leader veto power

content.prompt: Which of the following have veto power over legislation passed by the Islamic Consultative Assembly (Majles) ?

choices.label: The Assembly of Religious Experts and the Expediency Council
The Assembly of Religious Experts and the Guardian Council
The Guardian Council and the Supreme Leader

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
